This is way more than “just yoga”

This is yoga without the full-length mirror.

Yes, yoga is an amazing physical practice. But at Divinitree, we practice yoga to turn our attention inward and connect with the fullest versions of ourselves.

Come as you are

Drop any judgement you have of yourself or what you believe yoga "should" be.

Can't touch your toes? Never done yoga before? Looking for a meaningful practice that's still playful?

You're in the right place.
